column2:
"It's been a long time since my last visit
to the Greenscape area!
I feel so excited!"

"Plus being with you makes me even
more excited."

"I'm looking forward to clear the S rank
with you as soon as possible. C'mon,
let's go!"
"Oops <%me> go on and lead the way!"

"久しぶりの森林エリア！
なんだかワクワクするなあ！"

"しかもあなたと一緒となると
余計にワクワクするよ。"

"早くもＳランククリアが
楽しみになってきたね。
さ、行こう！"
